text.fortress.book.page1:
§l§nFORTRESS§r


§oHow To Play:§r


§a§l Building§r

  Place §omodules§r on your teams captured cells

§c§l Capturing§r

  Capture adjacent cells by standing on them
text.fortress.book.page2:
§3§l Earning§r
  Earn modules by getting kills

 Earn §ospecial§r modules by capturing an entire row

 §6§lWinning§r
  Control the most cells by the end of the game
